org.springframework.beans.factory.xml
Class BeansDtdResolver

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.BeansDtdResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.EntityResolver
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceBaseEntityResolver
public class BeansDtdResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.EntityResolver

EntityResolver implementation for the Spring beans DTD, to load the DTD from the Spring classpath resp. JAR file.

Fetches "spring-beans.dtd" from the classpath resource "/org/springframework/beans/factory/xml/spring-beans.dtd", no matter if specified as some local URL or as "http://www.springframework.org/dtd/spring-beans.dtd".

Since:
04.06.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
